game.name: Tower Defense 2D
game.description:
It is time to impress the world with your intensive aggressive skills? Are you to ready to go on the extremely thrilling and exciting war that you have ever experienced in the virtual world? Join Tower Defense 2D and get yourself ready to wear the crown of real warrior. You have to put your aggression, make strategy and fight like a true fighting hero to ensure your win in the end of this one of the best adventure games for boys. Follow the instructions to stand strong against your enemies.?

Many bad souls put their eyes on your kingdom and they will do their best to capture it. They are highly determined to rob various corners of your kingdom. However, you are blessed with the ultimate fighting skills. Get all your weapons in hands to give a strong reply to a horde of werewolves, goblins and other monsters in this brand new war game! Protecting each person of your kingdom is in your hands now!?

Make a proper plan and follow an effective strategy to place archers and wizards when you are going to upgrade their towers. Try to complete your task as fast as you can since your enemies are very fast and not going to show mercy on you. This HTML5 strategy game features multiple towers and abilities and multiple enemies. Put your strategy skills to test to clear all 6 levels of this cool fighting game. All the best for playing more war games on our free online game website. Good luck boys!?
